snippet: Over eight months, more than 500 dispensaries have closed in California. Local officials say the crackdown has brought new chaos to the medical marijuana industry.
abstract: Officials in Arcata, Calif, and other cities in the state that have ordinances regulating the medical marijuana industry are now at odds with federal prosecutors, who have closed more than 500 dispensaries since October 2011; local officials say the crackdown has brought new chaos to the industry.
lead_paragraph: Over eight months, more than 500 dispensaries have closed in California. Local officials say the crackdown has brought new chaos to the medical marijuana industry.

headline.seo: Hundreds of California Medical Marijuana Shops Close
headline.main: Cities Balk as Federal Law on Marijuana Is Enforced
headline.print_headline: Cities Balk As Federal Law On Marijuana Is Enforced
